title: Trunk - Locked In (2023) Summary

1. 'Trunk - Locked In': A Fast-Paced Thrill Ride in the Vein of 'Buried'
Feb 13, 2024 · Trunk: Locked In follows Malina (Sina Martens), a woman who has trained as a physician but left medicine behind following a tragic mishap.
We weigh in on the new Amazon MGM film, 'Trunk: Locked In’ and make a case for why it’s worth seeking out. Read more on Dread Central.
2. Trunk - Locked In - Rotten Tomatoes
Medical student Malina wakes up disoriented and realizes to her horror that she's locked inside the trunk of a speeding car.
Medical student Malina wakes up disoriented and realizes to her horror that she's locked inside the trunk of a speeding car. With her cellphone as her only link to the outside world and its battery draining rapidly, she wages a desperate, nail-biting battle for survival. With each passing minute, Malina unravels the truth about her abduction and is confronted with harrowing revelations from her past. Even if she makes it -- she will never be the same.
